column4: hi, FF and chrome both flash plugin crash when trying to load express.paltalk, a web-based paltalk client. Anyone, advise me?
flash plugin crashes a lot here. anyone?>
are you sure paltalk express is using only flash?  could this be a java issue?
you may well be right. it just that I get the flash complaint pop up
I do have java installed too
are you using the default opensource java or the oracle/sun java (which is in the Partner repository, not turned on by default!)
I don't think I@m using the opensource version of java - ice-tea - ? How can I tell for sure?
i get an error about OS!  You might have to try this in WINE Firefox!
no, express is web-based and it says it runs on windown, max and linux on their site from any browser like ff and opera
but in repos and synaptic i see Oubountu etc also ;)
+1 on bazhang's "not a good choice" comment
your reason sounds an ethical one. I would say that wubi is not making ubuntu rely on windows. I'm more interested on how it works from a purely functional/technical point of view
it most certainly DOES rely on windows.  BluesKaj +1
